basics.name: Marius Mihail Ion
basics.label: Front-end engineer
basics.summary: Senior front-end developer with 5 years of experience in the sector specializing in Angular and a passion for structure, order, and quality. With demonstrated skills to take on responsibilities, make sound decisions, and ensure customer satisfaction. Versatile and capable of working effectively both in teams and independently.

work.name: Vermont Solutions
work.summary:
My experience at Vermont Solutions stands out for execution and leadership in key projects, Angular skills, and a focus on code quality and security. I have developed competencies in teamwork, effective communication, and creative problem-solving, ensuring high-quality and timely deliveries.

Projects:

- Project 1:
  - Description: Front-end development of a charting tool with ChartsJS.
  - Role: Lead Developer.
  - Achievements: Successful implementation, meeting requirements and deadlines.

- Project 2:
  - Description: Leadership of a team of 5 developers in creating a mobile banking application for employee transaction and card management.
  - Role: Technical Lead.
  - Achievements: Timely deliveries, scalable and maintainable code.

- Project 3:
  - Description: Provided technical leadership to a team of 4 in the development of an internal real estate portal for Santander bank.
  - Role: Technical Lead.
  - Achievements: Successful delivery, improvement in team management and communication.

Technical Skills:
- Angular: Expert, including Angular 16 features.
- Testing: Unit testing with Karma + Jasmine.
- Code quality: Use of Sonar, ESLint, Fortify.
- Design: Implementation with Figma.
- CI/CD: Jenkins for deployments.
- Project management: Jira and Confluence.
- Interface components: Storybook.
- APIs: Implementation based on Swagger.
- Libraries: Nexus Repository (management of dependencies and NPM packages of Santander's internal libraries).
- Data visualization: ChartsJS.
- Mobile development: HammerJS for gestures.
- Design and accessibility: Flame (Santander's design system aimed at creating consistent and globally accessible digital products).
- Security and optimization: NgDarwin (Angular's internal library facilitating security, error logging, and configuration in Angular projects, optimizing web application development).

work.name: CloudAPPi
work.summary:
At CloudAppi, I was able to quickly gain experience in various projects and tackle developments of different complexities with React and AngularJS. I quickly acquired lost knowledge of React in record time due to reasons beyond my control, as they had to delay my entry into an Angular project. I ensured productive code creation in all developments and was a skilled communicator in the team from the beginning.

Technologies used:
- ReactJS (17)
- Redux Toolkit
- React Hooks
- Material UI
- Bootstrap
- Angular (8)
- Angular Material
- RxJS
- Angular Flex Layout (CSS Flexbox)

work.name: ENZO
work.summary:
Action takes center stage at Enzo for a new project and a client with international activities (agricultural sector), this time facing countless challenges of varying complexities.

Key Responsibilities:
- Creation and design of components (ngClass, ngStyle, etc.).
- Creation of reusable modules and components (dumb / smart components).
- Definition of interfaces / models using Typescript.
- Implementation of pipes and custom directives.
- Implementation of services.
- Consumption of REST APIs.
- Creation of navigation paths.
- Creation of forms (reactive).
- Implementation of lifecycles (ngOnInit, ngOnChange, etc.).
- Implementation of Angular Material styling layer and its component CDK.
- Creation of responsive designs adapted to other devices using Angular Flex Layout (CSS Flexbox).
- Bug fixes and enhancements in the web application.
- Meetings with the client (in English).
- Contribution to project documentation.
- Training of new team members.
- Contribution to better project organization.

Technical Skills:

- RxJS
- TypeScript + HTML5 + CSS3 + SCSS
- ngX-Rocket (enterprise-level project initializer for Angular 13+)
- Angular (13+)
- Angular Material
- Angular Flex Layout
- lodash

Coinciding with the fact that it was something I had been wanting to do, in addition to the global circumstances of the pandemic, I was presented with the opportunity to strike out on my own, developing and designing on WordPress. During this time, I acquired (and/or improved) skills such as self-management, project management, planning/decision-making, leadership, SEO, digital marketing, security, resource optimization, and some graphic design using professional tools such as Adobe Photoshop or Canva.

work.name: Altran
work.summary: At Altran they allowed me to give much more free rein to my creativity, and, in constant contact with the client, I was able to participate in a project that was in continuous development, all this through the use of agile methodologies (Scrum), Gitflow workflow, and using a more modern technology stack, such as .NET Core (C#) for back-end. Also, and with no previous knowledge, I learned to handle in less than two months quite fluently developments of varying complexities with ReactJS (textile sector).

work.name: IO Digital
work.summary: Among my responsibilities at IODigital I could highlight the creation and maintenance of web and desktop applications, mainly using the .NET technology stack (ASP, MVC, C#) from Microsoft (without leaving aside web technologies such as HTML, JavaScript, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap, AJAX Toolkit from DevExpress, etc). In addition, I was involved in the creation and enhancement of multiple scheduled tasks (console jobs), stored procedures, REST APIs, and reporting (multiple sectors).

work.name: STRATESYS
work.summary: Here I worked on a Single Page Application (SPA) web application in a maintenance line. My day-to-day work consisted of making corrective and evolutionary changes, providing user support, and managing and monitoring incidents/requests. For the back-end, we utilized a technology stack based on the .NET framework (ASP. MVC, C#), while the front-end technologies included HTML, JavaScript, CSS, jQuery, Kendo UI (Telerik), AJAX, and Bootstrap, among others. Regarding databases, we used Microsoft's SQL Server (in the petrochemical sector).

projects.name: concise-comrade-bot
projects.description: The concise-comrade-bot is a Telegram bot designed to provide concise and accurate summaries for various types of content. It leverages advanced algorithms to summarize YouTube videos and chat conversations efficiently, with a scalable architecture ready for future expansion into other summarization domains.

projects.name: angular-stock-tracker
projects.description: An interactive stock tracking web application that allows users to monitor real-time stock performance for companies listed on the stock market. Built with Angular, it provides a user-friendly interface to search for stock symbols and view essential stock details.
